description: Mont Blanc Cricket's home on the island of Jaya, where he lives with the Saruyama Alliance. The house serves as a base for Cricket's diving operations as he searches for evidence of the City of Gold.

keyEvents.title: Cricket Explains the Knock Up Stream
keyEvents.description: Cricket explains the mechanics of the Knock Up Stream to the Straw Hats at his house.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Straw Hats learn how to reach Skypiea.

keyEvents.title: Noland's Logbook Reveals Sky Island Bell
keyEvents.description: Cricket reads from Noland's logbook and shows gold artifacts at his house.
keyEvents.significance: The location where crucial evidence supporting Noland's story is revealed.

keyEvents.title: Saruyama Alliance Repairs Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Cricket's crew begins repairing and improving the Going Merry at Cricket's house.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the collaborative effort between the Saruyama Alliance and Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Bellamy Pirates Approach
keyEvents.description: The Bellamy Pirates approach Cricket's house while he and his crew work on the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: Foreshadows the upcoming attack on Cricket's home.

statusHistory.reason: Cricket's active residence and base of operations

description: The dense jungle forest on the island of Jaya, filled with dangerous wildlife including giant tarantulas, insects, and quicksand areas. The forest is home to the South Bird, a creature with an internal compass that always points south.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Enter Forest to Hunt South Bird
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates split into search parties and venture into Jaya's forest to capture a South Bird.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of the dangerous jungle environment on Jaya.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Chopper Find South Bird
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Chopper locate a South Bird in the forest but disturb a beehive, triggering an insect swarm.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the dangerous and chaotic wildlife of the Jaya jungle.

keyEvents.title: Tarantula Area
keyEvents.description: Sanji, Usopp, and Nami navigate through an area filled with massive tarantulas.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the diverse and dangerous creatures inhabiting the forest.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Gets Stuck in Quicksand
keyEvents.description: Zoro walks into a quagmire and becomes stuck in quicksand while searching alone.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the environmental hazards of the jungle beyond just wildlife.

statusHistory.reason: Natural jungle environment on Jaya island
